definitions.definition: A large flightless bird of the order Struthioniformes .

subdefinitions.definition: The most widespread species of the genus, known as the common ostrich ( Struthio camelus ).

definitions.definition: One who buries their head in the sand instead of acknowledging problems.
The hypothetical completion of a hole five strokes under par (a quintuple birdie , quadruple eagle , triple albatross , or double condor ).

main_definition: ( ornithology ) A large flightless bird of the order Struthioniformes .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) One who buries their head in the sand instead of acknowledging problems.
( golf ) The hypothetical completion of a hole five strokes under par (a quintuple birdie , quadruple eagle , triple albatross , or double condor ).
